content: pattern design by merri purdy email comments or questions to merripurdy@verizon net materials 1 skein - crystal palace yarns moonshine color 501 135 yards/50 gr or other light worsted weight fiber hook 8mm/size l crochet hook stitches used chain = chain xdc = crossed double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet gauge 8 sts and 4 row in xdc = 2 inches notes  pattern directions are written using american crochet terminology  the chain-3 at the start of a row counts as the first double_crochet of the row pattern directions row 1 chain 121 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain across to end chain 1 turn 120 single_crochet total row 2 single_crochet in each st across to end chain 1 turn row 3 single_crochet in each st across to end row 4 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet *skip one st double_crochet in next st double_crochet in skipped stitch xdc made repeat from * until the last st double_crochet in last st 1 double_crochet at each end with 59 xdc sets total for this row row 5 ch3 double_crochet in next st xdc to end of row 2dc at beg 59 xdc sets row 6 repeat row 4 row 7 repeat row 5 ch1 turn row 8 10 chain 1 at the beginning of each row then single_crochet in each st across to end 120 single_crochet leave enough yarn attached to the end of this row to seam up the short ends of the scarf i used a single_crochet along the short edges or you may wish to use a slip st finishing fold your scarf in half and seam up the short ends of the scarf so that it forms a circle fasten_off weave in tail to wear as shown in photo lay your scarf down flat you will have a double layer holding each end of the scarf twist it several times without losing the twist open each end of the scarf and place open ends held together over your head wear with pride you will look fabulous many thanks to my testers on ravelry aimeefae arielluria bizyhands cinderellaann dearmanica familydiva hummywinger jadedrachen
